title: Homage to H.P.L.
oneline: Bold dark cinematic sound design, brooding vocals and dark ambient soundscapes come together to pay homage to the spirit of H.P. Lovecraft.
bio: SKRIKA is the dark ambient project of Monty Adkins. Inspired more by the dark gothic surrealist paintings of Zdzisław Beksiński rather than 'ambient' per se, his work is released on the US-based label Cryo Chamber - Fifth Nature (2021) and Soludenia (2022).
